name: Safetymanager
0:
”Alexa, ask safety manager for a safety advice”
”Alexa, ask safety manager for a safety tip”
”Alexa, ask Safety manager to give a tip”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: safety manager
des:
This skill will give you everyday safety tips which will help you to improve yourself and to be safe during your working day.

You can ask Safety manager to give you a tip like:
Never use a blow dryer in the bathtub
Never dry your socks in the microwave oven
Never stand on a swivel chair
Stay away from firecrackers
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
